entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
